elements.expression:
esdocs index="restaurants_ex" fields="City/Country/Continent.keyword, City/Country/Continent" sort=", DESC"
| dropdownControl valueColumn="City/Country/Continent.keyword" filterColumn="City/Country/Continent"
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| essql 
  query="SELECT RatingText.keyword, avg(AverageCostForTwo)
  FROM restaurants_ex
  GROUP BY RatingText.keyword"
| table
| render

shape "square" fill="#24D1D6" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=0 maintainAspect=false
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| essql 
  query="SELECT count(RestaurantName) FROM restaurants_ex WHERE AverageCostForTwo<=300"
| math "count_RestaurantName_/9499"
| metric "Cheap Restaurants" 
  metricFont={font align="center" color="#000000" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=60 underline=false weight="normal"} 
  labelFont={font size=14 family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" color="#000000" align="center"} metricFormat="0,0.[00]%"
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| essql 
  query="SELECT count(RestaurantName) FROM restaurants_ex WHERE AverageCostForTwo>300"
| math "count_RestaurantName_/9499"
| metric "Expensive Restaurants" 
  metricFont={font align="center" color="#000000" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=60 underline=false weight="normal"} 
  labelFont={font size=14 family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" color="#000000" align="center"} metricFormat="0,0.[00]%"
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| essql 
  query="SELECT RestaurantName.keyword, AverageCostForTwo, RatingText.keyword
  FROM restaurants_ex"
| table perPage=5
| render

shape "square" fill="#FFAD69" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=0 maintainAspect=false
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| essql query="SELECT count(Votes) FROM restaurants_ex"
| math "count_Votes_"
| metric "Number of Votes" 
  metricFont={font size=48 family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" color="#000000" align="center" lHeight=48} 
  labelFont={font size=14 family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" color="#000000" align="center"} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| essql query="SELECT avg(AverageCostForTwo) FROM restaurants_ex"
| math "avg_AverageCostForTwo_"
| metric "Average Cost" 
  metricFont={font size=48 family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" color="#000000" align="center" lHeight=48} 
  labelFont={font size=14 family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" color="#000000" align="center"} metricFormat="0,0.[00]"
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| essql query="SELECT avg(AggregateRating) FROM restaurants_ex"
| math "avg_AggregateRating_"
| metric "Average Rating" 
  metricFont={font size=48 family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" color="#000000" align="center" lHeight=48} 
  labelFont={font size=14 family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" color="#000000" align="center"} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render
